meanings.definition: A person who is skilled in solving mysteries and crimes.
meanings.sent1: Sherlock Holmes was a famous detective known for solving difficult cases.
meanings.sent2: The holmes in the story uncovered the truth behind the mysterious disappearance.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends jokingly called their detective-savvy buddy 'Holmes'.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to solve complex puzzles made her the Holmes of the escape room.
meanings.sent5: The young detective's keen eye and sharp mind made him a true Holmes in the making.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a close friend or companion.
meanings.sent1: Hey Holmes, wanna grab some lunch together?
meanings.sent2: My holmes always has my back no matter what.
meanings.sent3: When his buddy showed up in a silly hat, he teased, 'Looking good, Holmes!'
meanings.sent4: She considered her loyal dog to be her furry holmes.
meanings.sent5: In times of trouble, a true holmes sticks by your side through thick and thin.
